2.4.name: wordpress/search-engine-verify
2.4.description: I read the other day on Google that if you buy a domain with a checkered past that has been punished by the search engines and you want it to be reincluded in the index... they said to VERIFY your site to get it re-indexed. This plugin checks your meta tags to verify they are live, on-demand!
